suggest.meta_keywords: Team Permissions, Azion Console, Access Rights Management, User Roles, Security Settings, Content Delivery, Edge Applications, Edge DNS, Edge Functions, Multi-Factor Authentication
suggest.meta_description: Explore the Team Permissions page in Azion Console for managing user roles, access rights, and security settings effectively within your organization.

current.meta_description: On the Team Permissions page in Azion Console, you can create, manage teams, control, and configure access rights for distinct teams within your organization.
